snippet.title: Randomish Races
snippet.description:
It is new twist on an old classic that people never knew they missed. Randomish Races pay homage to the very successful marketing campaign known as dot races. Once played in front of thousands of fans in stadiums and arenas, the game has now made its way to your computer. Players wager virtual currency to try to predict which dot, (red, blue, green, yellow) will finish the race first. This addicting yet simple game will keep you entertained for hours.

https://twitch.tv/randomishracer
